amendment.description: To provide funding for mass evacuation exercises.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4616 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4616 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Durbin. (consideration: CR S7494-7496; text: CR S7494) To provide funding for mass evacuation exercises.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4616 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Durbin.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4616 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
